text: The New World ’ s Ugliest Dog Has Just Been Crowned And Her Name Is Martha And the World ’ s Ugliest Dog of 2015 is … Martha, a Neapolitan Mastiff. In a competition usually comprised of tiny dogs, the 3 - year - old, 125 - pound dog beat out 13 other pups to take … http : / / ift. tt / 2sCtvxA
